audio.author_not_in_voice_channel: <:tickNo:342738745092734976> You need to be in a voice channel.
audio.user_does_not_exist_or_not_streaming: <:tickNo:342738745092734976> This user doesn't exist or is not currently streaming. Try entering a link to the channel.

now_playing.title: Now playing in {channel}
now_playing.footer: Type '!twitch leave' to stop the stream

audio.not_streaming: I'm not streaming anything on this server right now.

fields.name: Commands
fields.value:
`!twitch clips from <user>` - Gets a clip from the specified Twitch user
`!twitch clips trending` - Gets a trending clip
`!twitch clips game <game>` - Gets a clip from the specified game

commands_list.title: <:twitch:404633403603025921> Streamcord Commands
commands_list.description:
:warning: __**Do not put `<>` or `[]` around command arguments.**__

We recommend using the [dashboard](https://dash.streamcord.io) to easily manage notifications and live role.

fields.title: General
fields.value:
`!twitch help` - Shows bot help
`!twitch info` - Shows bot info
`!twitch lang` - Sets bot language
`!twitch invite` - Displays a link to add Streamcord to your server
`!twitch status` - Shows Twitch API status
`!twitch ping` - Pong!

fields.title: Twitch
fields.value:
`!twitch user <user>` - Gets info on a Twitch channel
`!twitch stream user <user>` - Gets info on a user's stream
`!twitch stream watch <user>` - Watch a Twitch stream from Discord
`!twitch stream game <name>` - Watch someone stream the specified game
`!twitch stream top` - Fetches info on a top stream
`!twitch game <name>` - Gets info on a Twitch game
`!twitch top` - Gets the most popular Twitch games

fields.title: Clips
fields.value:
`!twitch clips from <user>` - Gets a clip from the specified Twitch user
`!twitch clips trending` - Gets a trending clip
`!twitch clips game <game>` - Gets a clip from the specified game

fields.title: Streamer Notifications
fields.value:
`!twitch notif add [#discord_channel] [streamer_name] [message]` - Adds a streamer notification for a streamer to the specified channel
`!twitch notif remove <#discord_channel> <streamer_name>` - Remove a streamer notification for a streamer to the specified channel
`!twitch notif list [#discord_channel]` - Lists the streamer notifications for the specified channel
`!twitch notif formatting` - Shows variables that you can insert into streamer notification messages
`!twitch notif preview <#discord_channel> <streamer_name>` - Sends a preview message for a notification

fields.title: Live Role
fields.value:
`!twitch lr set role` - Sets the Live Role for the current server
`!twitch lr set filter` - Restricts Live Role to users with a specific role
`!twitch lr delete` - Removes the Live Role configuration
`!twitch lr view` - Tells you which role is currently set up
`!twitch lr check` - Debug the live role

fields.title: Audio
fields.value:
`!twitch listen <user>` - Listen to a Twitch stream in the current voice channel
`!twitch nowplaying` - Shows the stream currently playing, if any
`!twitch leave` - Leaves a voice channel

errors.err_report: Please report this error to the developers at <https://link.twitchbot.io/support>.
errors.forbidden: <:tickNo:342738745092734976> I don't have the correct permissions to do that.
errors.not_found: <:tickNo:342738745092734976> That Discord channel was not found. Make sure you're not putting <> around it and that you're `#mention`ing it.
errors.not_started: Streamcord is still starting up! Please wait a few minutes before trying again.
errors.check_fail: <:tickNo:342738745092734976> You don't have permission to run this command.
errors.cooldown: <:tickNo:342738745092734976> You can run this command in {time} seconds.
errors.conn_closed: <:tickNo:342738745092734976> The voice connection was closed. Reason: `{reason}`
errors.too_many_requests: <:tickNo:342738745092734976> Third-party servers are having trouble keeping up with our requests. Please try again later.

games.igdb_fetch_error: *Could not fetch game information from IGDB: {error}*
games.removal_notice: This command has been removed from Streamcord.

fields.name: Commands
fields.value: Streamcord responds to commands starting with `twitch` or `!twitch`. Type `!twitch commands` to view all runnable commands.

fields.name: Support
fields.value: If you need help with Streamcord, you can visit the [support center](https://help.streamcord.io) or join the [support server](https://discord.gg/UNYzJqV).

fields.name: Website
fields.value: You can view information about Streamcord at https://streamcord.io/twitch

fields.name: Dashboard
fields.value: Easily configure your server's notifications and live role from the Streamcord Dashboard. https://dash.streamcord.io

fields.name: Translations are here! :flag_mx::flag_es::flag_fr::flag_tr:
fields.value: Type `!twitch lang help` to view a list of languages that Streamcord is available in. Want to help us translate? Check out [Streamcord Translators](https://streamcord.io/twitch/translators) for more info.

available_translations.title: Available Translations
available_translations.footer: To set Streamcord's language, type !twitch lang <language>.

links.title: Links
links.value:
**·** Website: https://streamcord.io/twitch/
**·** Discord: https://discord.gg/UNYzJqV
**·** Upvote: https://discordbots.org/bot/twitch/vote

general.invite_message_1: **{user}**, you can invite me to a server with this link: <https://link.twitchbot.io/invite>
general.invite_message_2: Need help? Join the support server: <https://link.twitchbot.io/support>
general.lang_current: Your current language for Streamcord is **{lang}**. To change it, type `!twitch lang <lang>` or `!twitch lang help`.
general.lang_unavailable: <:tickNo:342738745092734976> That translation isn't available. Type `!twitch lang help` to view available languages.
general.lang_set: <:tickYes:342738345673228290> Successfully set your Streamcord language to **{lang}**.

command_usage.title: Streamer Notifications - Help
command_usage.description: Streamer notifications allow you to set up a customizable message that sends when a Twitch user goes live.

fields.name: Commands
fields.value:
`!twitch notif add [#discord_channel] [streamer_name] [message]` - Adds a streamer notification for a streamer to the specified channel
`!twitch notif remove <#discord_channel> <streamer_name>` - Remove a streamer notification for a streamer to the specified channel
`!twitch notif list [#discord_channel]` - Lists the streamer notifications for the specified channel
`!twitch notif formatting` - Shows variables that you can insert into streamer notification messages
`!twitch notif preview <#discord_channel> <streamer_name>` - Sends a preview message for a notification

notifs.limit_reached: <:twitch:404633403603025921> Hey there! Unfortunately you've reached the maximum amount of notifications that you can add to this server. To add more, you need to donate at <https://streamcord.io/twitch/pro>.
notifs.dashboard_notice: <:twitch:404633403603025921> We recommend using the dashboard for adding notifications. With the dashboard, you can customize your notifications with auto delete, embed color, and more. <https://dash.streamcord.io>
notifs.prompt1: Which channel do you want to receive the notification in? Mention or type the name of one below. *(respond in 60 seconds)*
notifs.prompt2: Type the name of the Twitch channel that you want to set up the notification for. *(respond in 60 seconds)*
notifs.prompt3: Enter a custom message that you want to be shown when the user goes live, or type `default` for the default message. *(respond in 180 seconds)*
notifs.text_channel_not_found: <:tickNo:342738745092734976> Couldn't find that text channel. Exiting command...
notifs.twitch_user_not_found: <:tickNo:342738745092734976> That Twitch user could not be found. Exiting command...
notifs.twitch_user_not_found_alt: <:tickNo:342738745092734976> That Twitch user doesn't exist. Make sure that you're not putting anything extra around the name (such as `<>`), and that you're not @mentioning a Discord user.
notifs.invalid_data: <:tickNo:342738745092734976> Invalid data was sent from Twitch:
notifs.malformed_user: <:tickNo:342738745092734976> That doesn't look like a valid Twitch user. You can only include underscores, letters, and numbers.
notifs.del_fail: <:tickNo:342738745092734976> No notification has been set up for this user.
notifs.del_success: <:tickYes:342738345673228290> You won't get any notifications in {channel} when {user} goes live.
notifs.no_notifs: No streamer notifications are set up for this channel.
notifs.bulk_delete_confirm: **You are about to delete {count} notifications in {channel}.** Are you sure that you want to do this? Reply with `yes` if you want to continue.
notifs.view_on_dashboard: View more details on the dashboard

notif_variables.title: Notification message variables
notif_variables.description: Use one of the variables below to insert data into a stream notification message.

fields.name: Available formatting
fields.value:
*`$title$`* - The stream's title
*`$viewers$`* - The number of people currently watching the stream
*`$game$`* - The game that the streamer is currently playing
*`$url$`* - The channel's URL
*`$name$`* - The channel's name
*`$everyone$`* - Inserts an @everyone mention
*`$here$`* - Inserts an @here mention

permissions.bot_need_perm: <:tickNo:342738745092734976> I need the **{permission}** permission to do this.
permissions.no_pm: <:tickNo:342738745092734976> You can only use this command in a server.

`!twitch stream watch <user>` - Watch a Twitch stream from Discord
`!twitch stream game <name>` - Watch someone stream the specified game
`!twitch stream top` - Fetches info on a top stream

general.command_moved: This command has been moved. Please use the `{cmd}` command instead.
lr.no_live_role_set: No live role is set up for this server.
lr.commands.view.title: Live role configuration
lr.commands.view.description: You can also manage live role from the [Streamcord Dashboard]({url})
lr.commands.view.footer: You can set a live role using `!twitch lr set role`
lr.commands.check.title: Live role check
lr.errors.invalid_role_hierarchy: The Streamcord role must be higher than the live role.
lr.errors.role_managed: The live role can't be managed by an integration.
lr.errors.default_role: The live role can't be the server's default role. Use the `lr del` command to clear the configuration.
lr.commands.set_role.success: Server members who stream on Twitch will receive the **{role}** role.
lr.errors.no_live_role_set: You must first set a live role using the `lr set role @role-name` command.
lr.commands.set_filter.success: Server members who stream on Twitch and have the **{filter}** role will receive the **{role}** role.
lr.commands.del.success: Removed this server's live role configuration.
lr.commands.del_filter.success: Removed this server's filter role configuration.
